</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value>Copy 5 LODs' selections:<code>private _car = "B_MRAP_01_F" [[createVehicle]] [[getPos]] [[player]];

} [[forEach]] ["Memory", "Geometry", "FireGeometry", "LandContact", "HitPoints"];
[[copyToClipboard]] (_return [[joinString]] [[endl]]);
